content.p: Assistant Professor Stuart Reeves takes you on a tour of our School of Computer Science. Tour of the School of Computer Science building with Stuart Reeves. Our robotics labs and facilities provide students with the opportunity to experiment with cutting-edge hardware and dedicated software tools. These will help you develop the skills and ideas for designing tomorrow's autonomous systems, from delivery drones to assistive robotics. Professor Christian Wagner Student experience Discover more about the societies, sport and networks at our Students' Union International students As an international student we understand you have even more to think about as you prepare to start with us at Nottingham.This section is dedicated to you. We cover all the extra bits you need to know as an international new starter, from applying for your visa to deciding what to pack, and how to plan for your journey. School of Mathematical Sciences From quantum physics and coding to gymnastics society and pub golf. Faculty of Arts Chloe is a third-year Music and Music Technology student. She discusses what she loves most about our facilities, learning new skills, and the sense of community in the department...
